description: [Webfist](http://webfist.org/) is a fallback for when providers don't support WebFinger natively. It lets you do WebFinger lookups for email addresses even if the owner of the domain name isn't playing along. WebFist works because of a judo move on an existing infrastructure: DKIM.
ohloh_description: WebFist implements WebFinger delegation for providers who don't support WebFinger natively.
name: Webfist
